messages.subject: Image request
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, Long-time lurker, first-time poster. I m looking for images of peasants from around the time of the Sengoku period, in particular images of peasants
messages.messageBody:
Hi all,

Long-time lurker, first-time poster.

I'm looking for images of peasants from around the time of the Sengoku
period, in particular images of peasants fighting with the Ikko-Ikki
armies.

More broadly, does anyone have any good links to a repository of
contemporary (or nearso) illustrations of Sengoku-era battles?

Many thanks!
David
